title.narrative: She Leads Uganda: Enhancing the participation of GYW by building responsive, and accountable systems in Bugiri

description.narrative: The project will engage Girls and Young Women (GYW) to meaningfully participate in decision making and addressing discriminatory social norms in Bugiri district.  It aims at increasing GYW participation in decision making and transformation of social norms, this aligns to She Leads program that recognizes the voices and participation of GYW as central. It also links the voices of GYW in Bugiri to the national level decision making processes

title.narrative: 16 like minded CSOs and GYW reached through training to influence decisions on involvement of GYW in public decision making

description.narrative: 16 like minded CSOs and GYW reached through training to influence decisions on involvement of GYW in public decision making

title.narrative: Number of GYW organisations trained in advocacy skills

description.narrative: Number of GYW organisations trained in advocacy skills

comment.narrative: The output target will be realized after the training of the CSOs is realized. By the time Covid lockdown came 8 like minded CSOs mapped and assessed and training is planned in July as it did not happen due to closure of some organization. More CBOs are being engaged for formidable support to GYW The cost reported was only for fuel for mapping.;

comment.narrative: The target variance was due to elimination of stakeholders who were previously engaged to avoid double counting. Over expenditure due to staff monthly airtime and sanitizers to support implement activities.;

comment.narrative: Over targets was due to more people reached to cover for target deficiencies in Q2 and low budget since there was an over expenditure in Q2 of 120 euros which when balanced the expenditure is on track.;

comment.narrative:
Due to restrictions on covid-19, only 89 community members have been reached with message on supporting GYW challenging negative social norms thus much has not been spent on the activity
The facilitation for the facilitators of the dialogue sessions was pending thus not reported in the financial reported it will be captured in the in the next report of Q3;

title.narrative: Number of L&A campaigns (including media) conducted

description.narrative: Number of L&A campaigns (including media) conducted

comment.narrative: During the quarter, much of the activities like orientation of media practitioners, printing of IEC materials, and radio talk shows had been carried forward from quarter 2 and have been done in quarter 3 thus the variances in the targets vs the actuals.;

The reported cost is for radio talk show expenses. The low budget expenditure is to the costs of IEC Materials, planned talk shows/spot messages out of six month by June only two had be conducted and orientation which was halted due to Covid all these have been rescheduled to be completed in Q3;
